Reviews.Title: Shipping takes a while, new as described
Reviews.Author: L. Toh
Reviews.Content: When it arrives, the package was well packed and the items were in the box like new. The phone has no camera and is unlocked as stated! However, it does not come with a memory card. but everything comes as described.

Reviews.Title: Item received excatly as described
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Product details is spot on and there was no delay in shipping the item. Phone is an old model but I need a non-camera phone for work so this is perfect for me.

Reviews.Title: No memory on this phone
Reviews.Author: online shopper
Reviews.Content: There was no memory on this phone apart form the application memory, therefore could not add any media files which was one of the main reasons I purchase this model.  A big disappointment!  There was no indication of this in the description, had I known I probably would not have purchased.  I will try to get a media card and hopefully that works.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Abraham Granado
Reviews.Content: Excelente Envio rapido tal cual lo queria en el momento de la compra, recomendado para todos los que quieran esto

Reviews.Title: No complaints yet!
Reviews.Author: Ajith J.
Reviews.Content: No complaints yet, bought it for my cousin as a gift. Recommended for all who want it, it internet connection is kind of flaky.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: m.lust
Reviews.Content: Phone had a camera even though the listing said it did not. Had on Verizon network and the signal was always weak or no service even if other Verizon phones had full signals.

Reviews.Title: Ok...Seller lived upto description
Reviews.Author: Manish
Reviews.Content: Its okay....some scartches on the phone but then it is refurbished that i had opted for so its okay....phone was unlocked as promised adn there are no other issues

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Kestan
Reviews.Content: This phone is great it was exactly what I was looking for. I purchased the phone used and it came like new brand. It was already unlocked so I just had to put in my sim and it worked like a charm and I'm from Trinidad and Tobago. I'm happy with my purchase and I would recommend this product to any one just wanting a phone for the social experience.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Content: Hi i bought a Blackberry Touch 9850 from u it say unlock phone Verizon wirelessWhen i put my Family Mobile shim card in it it say Activation Required why if it a unlock Phone why want it work with my shim cardWhit can i do i ned your help ASAPHomer Smith Think u

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4-inch TFT LCD display
BlackBerry smartphone with QWERTY keyboard; Access V Cast, Music and Video services via fast EV-DO data network; GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions; use phone as a modem for your laptop
dual-network capable for 3G-enabled GSM access when traveling abroad; Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD memory expansion to 16 GB; access to personal and corporate email
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 336 hours (14 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry BB 9630 Tour Verizon and GSM Unlocked Cell Phone with No Camera and GPS - No Warranty - Black
